item.title: Kristen add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Henry Miller
item.description: "The aim of life is to live, and to live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware." -- Henry Miller

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Henry Miller
item.description: "Develop an interest in life as you see it; the people, things, literature, music - the world is so rich, simply throbbing with rich treasures, beautiful souls and interesting people. Forget yourself." -- Henry Miller

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Frances Willard
item.description: "The world is wide, and I will not waste my life in friction when it could be turned into momentum. " -- Frances Willard

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy." -- Rumi
